scripts.test: npm run test:setup && npm run test:exec
scripts.test:exec: TRYORAMA_LOG_LEVEL=info RUST_LOG=error RUST_BACKTRACE=1 TRYORAMA_HOLOCHAIN_PATH="holochain" ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.test:setup: CARGO_TARGET_DIR=../target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && hc dna pack  ../workdir/dna
